headline: Can Roche (SWX:ROG) Leverage Digital Diagnostics to Reinforce Its Long-Term Innovation Lead?
summary: In recent days, Labcorp announced a collaboration with Roche to introduce FDA-cleared digital pathology slide scanners, while Roche separately unveiled the primary results for its sixth-generation high-sensitivity Troponin T test for heart attack diagnosis, both marking key advancements in diagnostic technology and clinical application. These developments highlight the increasing role of digital solutions and high-precision assays in addressing healthcare workforce shortages and improving...
